post:
Save 25% off your first month with coupon code *OVZ25*  
**Double your storage by opening a support ticket with "LET" in the subject**

***NodeBlade Solutions, LLC*** was founded at the start of December, 2015. *We are a registered LLC in the state of Florida.*

At NodeBlade, we strive for perfection; thus quality over quantity truly has a meaning here, which is why we do not oversell our servers; in-fact, as an example, we leave multiple gigabytes (GB) of RAM unused on our nodes, in case it's needed.
 
**Have any questions?** Contact us [here](https://my.nodeblade.com/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=3).
 
**OpenVZ VPS Hosting**  
All of our OpenVZ plans include the following:  

* Full root access  
* SolusVM Control Panel  
* Guaranteed allotment of dedicated RAM  
* Access to the most popular VPS templates - looking for one we don't have? Open a support ticket!  
* Access to our amazing support: although we are unmanaged, we still have your back!  
* 1 IPv4 address  
* 1 IPv6 /80 Block


**512MB Plan** - $3/mo (POPULAR)
 
* 2 vCPU
* 512MB RAM
* 512MB vSwap
* 75GB Storage
* 750GB Transfer (Bandwidth)
 
[***Buy Now***](http://my.nodeblade.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=21) or [View Details Page](http://nodeblade.com/vps.php)
 
**1024MB Plan** - $6/mo (**MOST** POPULAR)
 
* 2 vCPU
* 1024MB RAM
* 1024MB vSwap
* 100GB Storage
* 1000GB Transfer (Bandwidth)

[***Buy Now***](http://my.nodeblade.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=22) or [View Details Page](http://nodeblade.com/vps.php)

**256MB Plan** - $2/mo
 
* 1 vCPU
* 256MB RAM
* 256MB vSwap
* 50GB Storage
* 500GB Transfer (Bandwidth)
 
[***Buy Now***](http://my.nodeblade.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=20) or [View Details Page](http://nodeblade.com/vps.php)
 
**Save 25% off your first month with coupon code *OVZ25*  
**Double your storage by opening a support ticket with "LET" in the subject**  
**Have any questions?** Contact us [here](https://my.nodeblade.com/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=3).
